docs.title: Peterborough Chess Club
docs.text:
Note

Established in 1893, the Peterborough Chess Club has a rich history of fostering chess talents.

docs.title: History
docs.text: Peterborough Chess Club was established in the year 1893 with .....

docs.title: Membership Details
docs.text:
To join the Chess Club it is conditional on joining the Conservative Club.

Info

  • Annual Subscription for Conservative Club: £45 (Reduced fee from 01 July 2023)
  • ECF Bronze level membership or above required for games rating and club matches participation
  • Tuition available for beginners and intermediate players
  • Please, check ECF Child Protection Policy Statement before joining.

docs.title: Venue and Meeting Times
docs.text:
We meet at the Conservative Club, 77 Broadway, Peterborough PE1 4DA. Here are our meeting times:

  • Thursday: 6:30 pm - 11:00 pm
  • Exceptions: The first Thursday of each month when we meet the following Sunday at 6:00 pm instead.

Success

  • Upcoming Meetings:
    • Sunday, August 06
    • Thursdays, 10, 17, 24, 31 (AGM for one hour)
    • Sunday, September 10
